abstract: South Korean Pres Park Geun-hye warns of growing uncertainty in region due to North Korea's hostilities along two countries' border, days after reports that North Korean leader Kim Jong-un executed one of his top generals.
lead_paragraph: President Park Geun-hye said that North Korea’s conduct was raising uncertainty, after reports of a top general’s execution and artillery drills near disputed waters.

headline.main: South Korean Leader Voices Alarm at Kim Jong-un’s ‘Reign of Terror’
headline.print_headline: South Korea Expresses Alarm Over North’s ‘Reign of Terror’

snippet: President Park Geun-hye said that North Korea’s conduct was raising uncertainty, after reports of a top general’s execution and artillery drills near disputed waters.
